item.title: 有色人种协进会威胁就孟菲斯空气污染问题起诉埃隆-马斯克的 xAI 公司
item.description: 全美有色人种协进会（NAACP）周二向亿万富翁埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 xAI 公司发出通知，表示有意起诉该公司位于孟菲斯的人工智能初创公司数据中心造成的空气污染。【原文：The National Association for the Advancement of Colored People (NAACP) on Tuesday sent a notice to billionaire Elon Musk's xAI, signaling its intention to sue the company over air pollution from the AI startup's data center in Memphis.】

item.title: 西班牙 BBVA 银行建议富裕客户投资比特币
item.description: 西班牙对外银行（BBVA）的一位高管周二表示，该行正在建议富裕客户将其投资组合的最多 7% 投资于加密货币，这是一些银行对主流金融业因其风险而长期回避的领域产生好感的最新迹象。【原文：Spanish lender BBVA is advising wealthy clients to invest up to 7% of their portfolio into cryptocurrencies, an executive said on Tuesday, in the latest sign some banks are warming to a sector long avoided by mainstream finance because of its risks.】

item.title: Waymo 将机器人出租车服务扩展到旧金山湾区更多地区
item.description: Alphabet 旗下公司 Waymo 周二表示，作为美国唯一的商业机器人出租车运营商，Waymo 将向旧金山半岛更多地区和硅谷部分地区扩张，以扩大运营规模。【原文：Waymo will expand into more areas of the San Francisco peninsula and parts of Silicon Valley, as the sole commercial robotaxi operator in the U.S. seeks to scale up operations, the Alphabet unit said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，伊朗袭击后以色列的战争保险费用飙升
item.description: 业内人士周二表示，随着以色列和伊朗之间的战争进入第五天，运往以色列的货物的战争风险保险费比一周前高三倍之多。【原文：War risk insurance premiums for shipments to Israel are as much as three times higher than a week ago as the war between Israel and Iran entered its fifth day, industry sources said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 墨西哥湾 "标签在网上引发热议后，特朗普移动公司撤下覆盖范围地图
item.description: 特朗普移动公司（Trump Mobile）周一发布了美国制造的智能手机，但仅仅几个小时后，该公司就撤下了其覆盖地图，因为眼尖的用户发现了一个奇怪的细节：得克萨斯州以南的水域被标注为墨西哥湾（Gulf of Mexico），而不是特朗普喜欢的名称--美国湾（Gulf of America）。【原文：Just hours into Trump Mobile's Monday launch touting American-made smartphones, the venture pulled its coverage map after sharp-eyed users noticed a curious detail: the body of water south of Texas was labeled as the Gulf of Mexico instead of the Trump-preferred name, Gulf of America.】

item.title: 埃隆-马斯克的 X 公司就内容节制法起诉纽约
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 X 公司周二起诉纽约州总检察长，质疑该州要求社交媒体公司披露其如何监控仇恨言论、极端主义、虚假信息和其他内容的敏感信息的法律是否符合宪法。【原文：Elon Musk's X Corp sued New York's attorney general on Tuesday, challenging the constitutionality of a state law requiring social media companies to disclose sensitive information about how they monitor hate speech, extremism, disinformation and other content.】

item.title: FCC 称中国移动可能因未配合调查而面临美国罚款
item.description: 美国联邦通信委员会周二表示，可能对中国移动处以罚款，原因是中国移动未能回答该机构在调查中提出的问题，以确定其美国业务是否试图逃避美国的限制。【原文：The Federal Communications Commission said on Tuesday it could fine China Mobile for failing to answer questions in the agency's probe to determine if its U.S. operations are seeking to evade American restrictions.】

item.title: 参议院对特朗普税收法案的调整与众议院计划一致，被认为会增加美国债务
item.description: 分析师周二表示，美国参议院共和党人对总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的全面减税和支出法案提出的修改建议预计将推高美国的债务水平，这与众议院通过的版本的预测基本一致。【原文：U.S. Senate Republicans' proposed changes to President Donald Trump's sweeping tax-cut and spending bill are expected to push U.S. debt levels higher, roughly in line with projections from the House-passed version, analysts said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 三菱将美国新车价格平均上调 2.1
item.description: 三菱汽车公司（Mitsubishi Motors）周二表示，它将把美国汽车的价格平均上调2.1%，这是最近一家汽车制造商将成本增加转嫁给消费者，因为特朗普政府的关税导致消费者的支出增加。【原文：Mitsubishi Motors said Tuesday it is hiking prices of U.S. vehicles by 2.1% on average, the latest automaker to pass along cost increases to consumers as their expenses rise from the Trump administration's tariffs.】

item.title: 欧盟反垄断监管机构将于 7 月 22 日前就环球唱片与 Downtown Music 的交易做出裁决
item.description: 根据欧盟委员会周二提交的一份文件，欧盟反垄断监管机构将在 7 月 22 日前决定是否批准环球音乐集团以 7.75 亿美元收购 Downtown Music。【原文：EU antitrust regulators will decide by July 22 whether to clear Universal Music Group's $775 million acquisition of Downtown Music, according to a European Commission filing on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国 4 月份商业库存保持不变
item.description: 由于制造商库存下降，4 月份美国商业库存保持不变，这表明库存可能会拖累第二季度的国内生产总值。【原文：U.S. business inventories were unchanged in April amid a decline in stocks at manufacturers, suggesting inventories could be a drag on gross domestic product in the second quarter.】

item.title: Coinbase 寻求美国证券交易委员会批准提供区块链股票
item.description: Coinbase 的首席法务官在接受路透社采访时表示，Coinbase 正在寻求美国证券交易委员会的绿灯，以便向其客户提供 "代币化股票"。【原文：Coinbase is seeking a green light from the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission to offer "tokenized equities" to its customers, the crypto exchange's chief legal officer said in an interview with Reuters.】

item.title: 美国 5 月制造业产出勉强增长
item.description: 由于汽车和飞机产量的激增被其他方面的疲软部分抵消，5 月份美国工厂生产几乎没有增长，而制造业的前景仍被关税所笼罩。【原文：U.S. factory production barely rose in May as a surge in motor vehicle and aircraft output was partially offset by weakness elsewhere, and the outlook for manufacturing remains clouded by tariffs.】

item.title: NAHB 称美国住宅建筑商情绪降至两年半低点
item.description: 衡量美国住宅建筑商情绪的一项指标在 6 月份意外下滑至两年半以来的最低水平，超过三分之一的住宅建筑公司下调价格，以吸引因高抵押贷款利率和唐纳德-特朗普总统的关税所导致的经济不确定性而受到冷落的买家。【原文：A gauge of U.S. homebuilder sentiment slid unexpectedly to its lowest level in two and a half years in June, with more than a third of residential construction firms cutting prices to lure buyers sidelined by high mortgage rates and economic uncertainty due to President Donald Trump's tariffs.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，马斯克的 xAI 正在洽谈 43 亿美元的股权融资
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周二援引与投资者共享的信息报道，埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的人工智能初创公司 xAI 正在商谈在其 50 亿美元债务融资计划之外，通过股权投资筹集 43 亿美元。【原文：Elon Musk's AI startup xAI is in talks to raise $4.3 billion through an equity investment on top of its $5 billion debt funding plans, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday, citing information shared with investors.】

item.title: 应用直觉公司最新融资估值达 150 亿美元
item.description: 汽车软件供应商应用直觉公司（Applied Intuition）周二表示，该公司在一轮融资中获得了 150 亿美元的估值，融资额达 6 亿美元，这表明对商业化自动驾驶汽车技术的投资欲望十分强烈。【原文：Applied Intuition secured a $15 billion valuation in a funding round where it raised $600 million, the automotive software supplier said on Tuesday, signaling a strong investment appetite for commercialized autonomous vehicle technology.】

item.title: 备忘录显示，在旅游需求疲软的情况下，捷蓝航空计划削减新成本
item.description: 路透社看到的一份内部备忘录显示，由于旅游需求疲软损害了利润，捷蓝航空公司正在计划一系列新的成本控制措施，包括减少航班和停放部分喷气式飞机。【原文：JetBlue Airways is planning a host of new cost-control measures including reducing flights and parking some of its jets, as weak demand for travel hurts margins, according to an internal memo seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 随着美国立法的成形，稳定币在企业中的地位日益提高
item.description: 随着被称为《GENIUS 法案》的美国稳定币法案在参议院取得进展，加密货币行业的一个曾经的小众角落正迅速获得全球企业的青睐。【原文：As the U.S. stablecoin bill, known as the GENIUS Act, advances in the Senate, a once-niche corner of the crypto industry is gaining rapid traction among global corporates.】

item.title: 独家报道：联合利华提议彼得-特尔-库尔夫出任上市冰淇淋部门首席执行官
item.description: 联合利华周二表示，已提议将其即将上市的冰淇淋业务交由彼得-特尔-库尔夫（Peter ter Kulve）领导，本-杰瑞公司董事会曾在诉讼中指责彼得-特尔-库尔夫 "令人瞠目 "的无知以及对其社会目标政策的篡改。【原文：Unilever said on Tuesday that it has proposed its soon-to-be listed ice cream business will be led by Peter ter Kulve, whom the Ben & Jerry's board has accused in lawsuits of "eye-popping" ignorance and muzzling its social purpose policies.】

item.title: 罗尔斯-罗伊斯称 "更真实地 "希望进入窄体飞机市场
item.description: 罗尔斯-罗伊斯公司首席执行官图凡-埃尔金比勒奇（Tufan Erginbilgic）周二表示，这家英国喷气发动机制造商希望进入窄体飞机市场，最好是通过合作的方式。【原文：Rolls-Royce CEO Tufan Erginbilgic said on Tuesday it was "even more true" that the British jet engine maker would like to enter the narrowbody plane market, preferably through a partnership.】

item.title: 数据显示，《GTA VI》延期影响全球电子游戏市场增长
item.description: 据路透社周二独家报道，研究公司 Newzoo 的一份报告显示，2025 年全球电子游戏市场的增长率预计将比上一年略有提高。【原文：The global videogame market's growth rate is expected to improve marginally in 2025 from the previous year, according to a report from research firm Newzoo, seen exclusively by Reuters on Tuesday.】

item.title: Adobe 为手机带来人工智能图像生成应用程序，并增加了合作伙伴
item.description: Adobe 公司周二发布了首款专用人工智能智能手机应用程序，其中包括来自该公司及其合作伙伴公司的人工智能模型，旨在利用在社交媒体上分享人工智能图像和视频这一日益增长的趋势。【原文：Adobe Inc. released its first dedicated artificial intelligence smartphone app on Tuesday that includes AI models from the company and partner firms, in a bid to tap into a growing trend of sharing AI images and videos over social media.】

item.title: 数据中心需求保持强劲，苹果供应商捷普上调年度预期
item.description: 电子元件制造商捷普周二上调了全年利润和收入预期，押注于数据中心强劲的基础设施服务需求。【原文：Electronics component maker Jabil raised full-year profit and revenue forecast on Tuesday, betting on strong infrastructure services demand for data centers.】

item.title: 戴姆勒卡车公司称稀土供应问题导致库存增加
item.description: 戴姆勒卡车公司首席执行官卡琳-拉德斯特罗姆（Karin Radstrom）周二在哥德堡举行的一次会议后告诉记者，中国关键原材料的供应障碍已促使卡车制造商戴姆勒卡车公司在短期内增加库存。【原文：Obstacles to the supply of key raw materials from China have prompted truckmaker Daimler Truck to increase its inventories in the short term, CEO Karin Radstrom told reporters after a conference in Gothenburg on Tuesday.】

item.title: 空中客车公司与越南航空公司达成协议，航展上结束关税的希望升温
item.description: 在周二举行的巴黎航展上，空中客车公司与廉价航空公司 VietJet 就多达 150 架单通道喷气机达成了协议，美国运输部长肖恩-达菲（Sean Duffy）在航展上为业界恢复免关税贸易的希望打了一支强心针。【原文：Airbus struck a deal with budget airline VietJet for up to 150 single-aisle jets at the Paris Airshow on Tuesday, where industry hopes of a return to tariff-free trade were given a boost by U.S. Transport Secretary Sean Duffy.】

item.title: 美国 5 月零售额大幅下降
item.description: 美国 5 月份零售额降幅超过预期，受机动车购买量下降拖累，原因是人们急于打消与关税相关的潜在涨价预期，但消费者支出仍受到工资稳健增长的支撑。【原文：U.S. retail sales dropped more than expected in May, weighed down by a decline in motor vehicle purchases as a rush to beat potential tariffs-related price hikes ebbed, but consumer spending remained supported by solid wage growth.】

item.title: 数据分析初创公司 Coralogix 在最新一轮融资中将估值翻倍，超过 10 亿美元
item.description: 数据分析平台 Coralogix 的联合创始人兼首席执行官阿里尔-阿萨拉夫（Ariel Assaraf）在接受路透社采访时表示，随着人工智能驱动的企业产品不断引起投资者的兴趣，该公司在最新一轮融资中的估值几乎翻了一番，超过了 10 亿美元。【原文：Data analytics platform Coralogix nearly doubled its valuation to over $1 billion in its latest funding round, co-founder and CEO Ariel Assaraf told Reuters in an interview, as artificial intelligence-driven enterprise offerings continue to pique investor delight.】

item.title: 日产推出新聆风，重振电动汽车雄风
item.description: 自 2010 年首款聆风电动车进入展厅以来，日产已从大众市场的电动车先锋沦为落后者。【原文：Nissan is betting on a new version of its Leaf electric vehicle (EV) to revive its fortunes, having gone from mass-market EV pioneer to laggard since its first model entered showrooms in 2010.】

item.title: 肯德基母公司百胜餐饮集团财务总监克里斯-特纳将接任首席执行官一职
item.description: 百胜餐饮集团周二任命其财务总监克里斯-特纳（Chris Turner）为首席执行官，接替将于明年退休的公司资深人士大卫-吉布斯（David Gibbs）。【原文：Yum Brands on Tuesday named its finance chief Chris Turner as its CEO, succeeding company veteran David Gibbs, who is retiring next year.】

item.title: 意大利莱昂纳多公司收购欧洲网络安全公司
item.description: 意大利莱昂纳多公司（Leonardo）董事长周二告诉路透社，该公司将很快宣布收购一家欧洲网络安全公司。【原文：Italy's Leonardo will soon announce the acquisition of a European cybersecurity company, its chairman told Reuters on Tuesday, as the aerospace and defence group consolidates a business seen as increasingly important in new combat systems.】
